sections.title: Mục tiêu
sections.content: Trang chủ công khai, tập trung vào tìm kiếm BĐS (giống Property Finder).

sections.title: Navigation
sections.content:
• Logo IONEXUS
  • Tabs: Buy | Rent | Commercial | New Projects | Find Agent | Explore | Mortgages
  • CTA: Login/Register

sections.title: Hero / Search
sections.content:
• Tabset: Buy/Rent/Commercial/Projects
  • Input: City/Community/Building
  • CTA: Find
  • Filter chips: Property Type, Beds & Baths, Price, More
  • Toggle: Map View

sections.title: Sections
sections.content:
• Popular Searches
  • Featured Projects (carousel)
  • Explore by Area (tiles)
  • Featured Properties (grid)
  • Featured Agencies
  • Articles & Guides
  • CTA: Download app / Create alert / Subscribe newsletter
  • Footer links
